'''Roheryn''' was the [[Horses|horse]] of [[Aragorn]], brought to him out of the north by the [[Rangers of the North|Rangers]] during the [[War of the Ring]],<ref>{{RK|V2}}</ref> and said to have been a gift from the lady [[Arwen|Arwen Evenstar]].<ref name=Appendix>{{S|Appendix}}</ref>
==Etymology==
''Roheryn'' is a [[Númenórean Sindarin]] name, softened from the pure [[Sindarin]] ''Rocheryn'', meaning "Steed of the Lady".<ref>{{PE|17}}, p. 97-8</ref> The first element in ''Ro(c)heryn'' is ''[[Horses#Names|roch]]'' ("horse"), the second ''heryn'' ("lady").<ref name=Appendix/>
